title-insurance.title: Title Insurance
title-insurance.subtitle: Comprehensive Title Search and Insurance Services

sections.title: Title Search Services
sections.content: We have a combination of experienced Abstractors and Title Analysts with an in-depth understanding of U.S. title Industry, spanning across various States and counties. Each Abstractor possesses at least 8 years of experience in Title search and Typists are well versed with typing out the reports in client software's such as Gators, Ramp Quest, Web-based and MS Word Document.

sections.title: FROM CURRENT OWNER SEARCH OR TWO OWNER SEARCH TO FULL SEARCH
sections.content: We have an experienced network of abstractors and attorneys delivering across all counties of the USA, exemplary accurate searches, within the TAT(Turn Around Time). Some of our title search services include

steps.title: Order Entry
details: Verify property information and place order for search docs (In-House or Outside Abstractor)

steps.title: Examination
details: Examination of documents found during search that affect the title of the property
Review of Legal Ownership, Property Taxes, Judgements/ Liens

steps.title: Curative
details: Review Chain of Title
Verifying Vesting
Curing Open Mortgages
Clear Title and issue CTC to the Lender

steps.title: Scheduling
details: Calling Borrowers to confirm on Closing Date, Time, and Location
Fixing Notary to the Closing
Confirm Closing Status

steps.title: Closing Disclosure
details: Key all relevant Fees
Calculate prior mortgage Payoff
Confirming Hazard Insurance Status
Confirming Property Taxes
Prepare CD to deliver to the Borrowers
Ensure accuracy of the delivered CD

steps.title: Doc Prep
details: Assigning Closing Package to Notary/ Attorney to perform Closing

steps.title: Post Closing
details: Review the signed package
Prepare Funding Documents
Send to lender requesting for Disbursal of Funds

steps.title: Funding
details: Assigning Closing Package to Notary/ Attorney to perform Closing

steps.title: Recording
details: Upload all Documents and assign to all non Online Vendors

steps.title: Policy Production
details: Keying all the pertinent details in the system and generating the Policies

sections.title: Additional Services
bullets: DATA ENTRY AND TITLE DOCUMENT INDEXING

sections.title: DATA ENTRY AND TITLE DOCUMENT INDEXING
sections.content: At Ardur we undertake text indexing services where data is readily available and quickly responds to users. Our data management experts handle text indexing using unique words and phrases which can search in the local database or other digital databases.

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: We provide Title Plant Indexing services to the Real Estate industry across the U.S.A. We capture information from property related documents such as Deed, Deed of Trust, Lien documents, Marriage Certificates, Right of way, Easement and other documents.

sections.title: OUR DATA CAPTURE COMPRISES OF
bullets: Parties related information (Grantor, Grantee, Document Type, Amount and Dates).
Legal details (Subdivision, Block, lot, Acreage, volume, page and prior references).

sections.title: Quality & Turnaround
sections.content: We have expertise to key the back plant documents as well as Go Forward documents with excellent quality and turnaround time. We process double key and triple compare of each and every document to maintain 99.995% accuracy.

sections.title: Projection
sections.content: We provide Projection for Back Plant Indexing and for Go Forward.

tax-services.title: Tax Services
tax-services.subtitle: Comprehensive Property Tax and Municipal Lien Reports

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: We deliver comprehensive property tax, Municipal lien and code violation reports to the title and banking industry. Our services include residential and commercial pre closing certificates, code and assessment violation reports, escrow and non escrow reporting and tax line setup.

sections.title: Reliable, Accurate and Timely Tax Reporting
sections.content: Our Tax Amount Report provides details such as due dates, tax amounts, and required methods of payment. Lenders and servicers can rely on Ardur for reliable procurement of tax information, accurate payment specifications of tax authorities, and timely payments.

sections.title: Appraisal Review
sections.content: Enriched with over 10 years of experience in handling appraisal services, working with all types of appraisers, loan types, and lenders. Our Appraisal Quality Control teams understand the different type of forms, lender requirements, checklists to perform quality control appraisal review, for our customers.

sections.title: Review Tasks
bullets: Re-Review Appraisal Reports upon receipt of revised Appraisal Reports
Handle Post Completion Revision Requests from the Clients

sections.title: Forms We Deal With

1075 - Exterior-Only Individual Condominium Unit Appraisal Report

sections.title: Order Management
bullets: Order Entry - Currently doing order entry on the portal of our clients
Order Assignment - Manually Assigning of orders to Appraisers/Brokers

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: In order to provide a broker price opinion, we look at comparable homes that have sold recently, typically within the past three months in the same neighbourhood, and make pricing adjustments based on a variety of factors such as the size, condition and location of the home.

appraisal-vendor-management.title: Appraisal Vendor Management & Customer Service
appraisal-vendor-management.subtitle: Complete Vendor and Order Management Solutions

sections.title: 1. Appointment Tracking and Follow up
sections.content: We act as a communication channel between the appraiser and the client to ensure the appointment date is set by the appraiser as soon as possible and if they are facing any issue we take the right action to handle the situation and keep the client updated.

sections.title: 2. Qualifying New Appraisers
sections.content: Ardur generates as possible appraisers to your appraiser database after verifying their various documents such as W9, License, E&O, etc., or any other document required. Placement - We own the responsibility to find quotes for a particular order from the appraisers and then updating all the quotes received and selecting the appraiser whose quote suits the client the most.

sections.title: 3. Updation of Vendor Details
sections.content: We update the details of the vendor with the latest information or any new changes made and ensure that their insurance and license are up to date.

sections.title: 4. Reports Updation
sections.content: We monitor and ensure that the appraiser submits the report one or two days before the due date. If the request for extension of the due date, we take the appropriate action as well as if they face any other issue we work on it to solve it as soon as possible.

sections.title: 5. Delivery of Reports
sections.content: We upload the report manually or any other method available in the Appraisal Software.

sections.title: 6. Quote Requests
sections.content: Our Team provides a detailed quote request which will detail the client, product(s), property address, loan type, and transaction type. Ardur will determine which appraisers are eligible for the potential assignment and email those appraisers for quotes. The Ardur Team shall review the options to quote their client.

sections.title: 7. Appraisal - Vendor and Order Management
sections.content: We keep the profile of a Vendor updated matching the details in the ASC site and keep the client updated about the same. We act as a communication bridge between the clients and the appraisers.

sections.title: 8. Status Management
bullets: Check or Confirm Inspection schedule and Submission of report
Follow-up with Appraisers to obtain revised Appraisal Reports
Procurement of PA and FHA case numbers
Review of Docs, i.e., PA, Bids, and Prior/Original Reports
